item1.title: Question 2.1
item1.firstLine: An airplane points at an angle of 75 degrees as shown in the figure and takes off at a speed of 250m/s. The wind blows in the x direction at a speed of 10m/s, changing the resultant velocity of the airplane.
item1.secondLine: In a simulation of the airplane’s motion, which of the following sets of blocks should be used to set the x and y components of the airplane’s resultant velocity?
